授業目的:
The purpose of this course is to provide a
deeper understanding of research in marketing and consumer behavior.
到達目標:
Students will develop the
     ability to critically examine and discuss relevant research topics in
     marketing and consumer behavior.
 Students will acquire a
     practical understanding of research that meets professional quality
     standards.

トピック.授業計画1: The course will review and discuss research interests in marketing and consumer behavior. Individual discussions will focus on critical literature reviews of the theoretical and practical aspects of marketing, and understanding the challenges faced by marketing researchers and practitioners.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to obtain relevant articles related to their research interests. They should contact the instructor if they need access to specific research materials. Class preparations beyond the assigned readings are encouraged to broaden understanding and contribute constructively to all discussions.
